description: Support to the Ethiopian  Mine Action Programme in Afar, Tigray and Somali Regions

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: The purpose of this project is to demine and ensure the continuation of demining activities in the most affected communities of Tigray, Afar and Somali regions for improved safety and food security of the community, while improving and accelerating the demining capacity of Ethiopian Mine Action Office.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Mine Action in the Tigray and

title: Mine Action in Tigray and Afar Regions of Ethiopia
